user_query: I want to plan a romantic dinner by the beach in Maldives. Can you give me the azimuth and elevation of the sun during sunset at the coordinates (3.2028, 73.2207)? Also, provide me with the tide station area data and sea level data for that location.

TaskList.description: Fetch the sunset time for the specified coordinates (3.2028, 73.2207).
Calculate the azimuth and elevation of the sun during sunset based on the sunset time obtained in step 1.
Fetch the tide station area data for the specified coordinates (3.2028, 73.2207).
Obtain sea level data for the specified coordinates (3.2028, 73.2207).
